Package com.dms.service

Class DocumentCommonService

java.lang.Object
com.dms.service.DocumentCommonService
@Service public class DocumentCommonService extends Object
Service class for common document and document revision-related operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jakub Pavlíček

    • getRevisionByDocumentAndId

      public DocumentRevision getRevisionByDocumentAndId(Document document, String revisionId)
      Retrieves a document revision by document and revision ID.
      Parameters:
      document - the document to which the revision belongs
      revisionId - the ID of the revision to retrieve
      Returns:
      the document revision
      Throws:
      RevisionNotFoundException - if the revision with the given ID is not found for the document

    • getLastRevisionVersion

      public Long getLastRevisionVersion(Document document)
      Retrieves the last revision version for the given document.
      Parameters:
      document - the document for which to retrieve the last revision version
      Returns:
      the last revision version, or 0 if no revisions exist for the document
